title: Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be A Junior Ranger         NPS  Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace Junior Ranger Program Ready to become a Junior Ranger and help the National Park Service preserve and protect Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace National Historic Site? You can view and print out the booklet here. Junior Rangers can either complete the booklet when visiting the park or complete it at home and present the finished booklet to one of the Rangers to review. Once he or she has signed to the certificate on the back, you'll receive your Junior Ranger badge.
